message: It's very nice looking, but I'm still using Vim with the Vim-R-plugin. Perhaps if they add some of the RCmdr functionality I might use it more, but if I'm going to have to do most stuff on the command line still then I might as well carry on using Vim.
I'd love to see it replace RCmdr
details, following up on @atomicules, re Vim-R-plugin: http://brokeringclosure.wordpress.com/2010/12/02/r-with-vim/
